item.title: Setting up Inverse Search with Neovim, VimTeX and Zathura
item.description: There are many reasons to write LaTeX in Vim instead of the more “traditional” LaTeX editors. Maybe you want to type long equations quickly with the help of UltiSnips or you just want to make the most of Vim’s many features. Setting up inverse search allows you to jump to a point in your .tex file by Ctrl-clicking the corresponding place in your .pdf file, which can be especially useful for long documents.

item.title: Coffee Cup to Doughnut Animation
item.description: I made this animation using Blender when writing my project proposal for my Studienstiftung application.

item.title: Publications
item.description: R. Knapman, D. R. Rodrigues, J. Masell, and K. Everschor-Sitte, “Current-induced H-shaped-skyrmion creation and their dynamics in the helical phase”, Journal of Physics D: Applied Physics, 54(40), 404003 (2021). arXiv: 2105.06859. D. R. Rodrigues, J. Nothhelfer, M. Mohseni, R. Knapman, P. Pirro, and K. Everschor-Sitte, “Nonlinear Dynamics of Topological Ferromagnetic Textures for Frequency Multiplication”, Phys. Rev. Appl., 10, 14020 (2021). arXiv: 2012.11481.
